function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Permanent aversion to large public gatherings","Impact":"Threat to public space as an organizing space and restriction of opportunities for coming together","Mitigation":"Rediscover and reinvigorate the social, civic, and recreational uses of the public realm","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General public","Owner":"City planners, architects, community leaders"},{"Description":"Changes in city design due to aversion to gatherings","Impact":"Alteration of urban planning priorities and infrastructure, potential neglect of large public spaces","Mitigation":"Reconsider urban needs and balance with public gathering spaces","Technologies":"Urban design and planning technology","People":"City planners, architects","Owner":"City planners, architects"},{"Description":"Value of large flexible spaces as assets post-COVID-19","Impact":"Recognition of the importance of flexible spaces for emergency health purposes","Mitigation":"Utilize large public spaces for emergency health purposes and ensure their preservation","Technologies":"Urban transformation and health facility technology","People":"General public, health officials","Owner":"City planners, health officials"}]}
